column1: Smoque BBQ////The sides are great. We had Mac n' Cheese
column2: Brisket Chili and Cornbread. The Slaw comes with the meal
column3: too. They were all awesome. Mac n' Cheese was very cheesy
column5: and not overcooked like many establishments. The Brisket Chili is almost as good as mine (seriously that is awesome Chili). Heavy on the Brisket
column6: light on the beans. The Cornbread was sweet and moist
column7: and delicious. And now the Slaw. Normally I like creamy Slaw
column8: but this Slaw was fabulous. Sweet vinegar with red onions and cabbage. Simple
